function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of machine learning algorithms for predicting specific diseases introduces potential for inaccurate predictions.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis or delayed treatment leading to worsened patient outcomes.","Mitigation":"Regular validation and updating of algorithms based on new data and feedback from healthcare professionals.","Technologies":"Consistently updated machine learning models and algorithms based on current medical data and research.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, medical researchers, data scientists"},{"Description":"Reliance on AI and ML for prognosis and biomarker prediction may lead to misinterpretation of results and misinformed treatment decisions.","Impact":"Increased risk of incorrect treatment and medication for patients.","Mitigation":"Cross-validation and consultation with domain experts to verify and interpret AI and ML-generated prognostic markers.","Technologies":"Cross-validation techniques, consultation with medical professionals, and domain-specific expertise.","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, patients","Owner":"Medical researchers, data scientists, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Unsupervised learning for identifying biological samples and subgroups may result in inaccurate classification and treatment decisions.","Impact":"Misclassification of biological samples and improper treatment based on incorrect subgroups.","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and verification of unsupervised learning results by domain experts and further testing in real-world clinical settings.","Technologies":"Thorough validation techniques, consultation with medical professionals, and real-world clinical testing.","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, patients","Owner":"Medical researchers, data scientists, healthcare institutions"}]}
